video.title: Rurouni Kenshin
video.synopsis: A nomadic swordsman arrives at a martial arts school in Meiji-era Japan, where he lands in the middle of a conflict involving the opium trade.

episodes.synopsis: A woman invites a wandering swordsman into her family's dojo. When he defeats a fearsome foe, his true and notorious identity is revealed.
episodes.title: The Handsome Swordsman of Legend / A Man who Fights for Love

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin and Kaoru encounter a young pickpocket and soon discover that the boy, who has a strong samurai bloodline, now works for the Japanese mafia.
episodes.title: Kid Samurai / A Big Ordeal and a New Student

episodes.synopsis: Yahiko is restless with the teachings of Kamiya Kasshin-ryu; Kenshin must weigh an invitation to rejoin the military as a high-ranking officer.
episodes.title: Swordsman of Sorrow / The Man Who Slays His Past

episodes.synopsis: Defeated in the past by Kenshin, Gohei Hiruma hires a fighter known as Zanza to bring Kenshin to his knees. Zanza accepts, but for his own reasons.
episodes.title: Bad! Introducing Sanosuke: Fighter-for-Hire

episodes.synopsis: Zanza returns with a grudge -- and the intention to make Kenshin pay for the suffering of Zanza's captain and crew. But Kenshin sees a better way.
episodes.title: The Reverse-blade Sword vs. the Zanbatou / Beyond the Battle

episodes.synopsis: Kaoru gets kidnapped when the government reaches out to Kenshin to help stop a ruthless former hitokiri from murdering state officials.
episodes.title: The Appearance of Kurogasa / Visitor from the Shadows

episodes.synopsis: With Kaoru as a hostage, Kenshin is tempted to free her by reverting back to a man-slayer. Can Kaoru stop him from delivering a fatal blow?
episodes.title: Deathmatch under the Moon! / Protect the One You Love

episodes.synopsis: As Sanosuke grieves over his friend who died from an opium overdose, a mysterious woman arrives needing his help to escape an elite group of ninjas.
episodes.title: A New Battle! The Mysterious Beauty from Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: A cunning industrialist forces Megumi to return by threatening the people at the dojo. But when Megumi complies, she puts her life on the line.
episodes.title: The Strongest Group of Ninjas / The Horrible Oniwaban Group

episodes.synopsis: The squad must get past the Oniwabanshū to bring Megumi home. Kenshin defeats Han'nya, and with Sanosuke by his side, battles Commander Aoshi.
episodes.title: Aoshi: Someone So Beautiful It's Frightening

episodes.synopsis: Aoshi feels dishonored when Kenshin refuses to kill him in a duel, as the moral codes of the old world and the new dawning era clash in battle.
episodes.title: Farewell, the Strongest Men / The Clash of Light and Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Yahiko falls for a girl at the Akabeko restaurant. When thugs pressure her to help them gain entry, Yahiko decides to help her, all by himself.
episodes.title: Birth of a Boy Swordsman: The Battle of First Apprentice Yahiko

episodes.synopsis: Kaoru takes in Toramaru, a sumo wrestler who has lost his confidence, and teaches him how to win at life.
episodes.title: Strive for the Grand Championship / Toramaru's Sumo Battle Log!

episodes.synopsis: Megumi treats a girl with a failing heart, but a greedy faith healer claims to perform "miracles." Can Kenshin and Sanosuke save the patient in time?
episodes.title: To Save a Small Life / Lady Doctor Megumi to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: The Jinpuu squad tries to force a local teacher to carry out vigilante assassinations, but when Kenshin opposes them, their leader vows to kill him.
episodes.title: Two Legendary Manslayers / Two Legendary Slashers

episodes.synopsis: Sasaki's former student, Toma, is forced to make amends to his mentor when the Jinpuu squad he leads suffers a crushing defeat.
episodes.title: A Promise from the Heart: The Secret Sword Technique of Shiden

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin and his crew deal with a crooked businessman who tries to undermine Marimo and her father, who are putting on a show at the fair.
episodes.title: Fly to Your Dreams / Marimo, The Human Cannon

episodes.synopsis: It appears that Kenshin is outmatched when Gohei Hiruma hires the Onizaki brothers to kill him and gains possession of the reverse-blade sword.
episodes.title: Run Yahiko! Get the Reverse-Edged Sword Back

episodes.synopsis: In the mountains of Izu, Dr. Gensai's sister shows the gang the homestead of a young heir who seeks a powerful sword master -- and chooses Raijuta.
episodes.title: Raijuta's Ambition / The Fantasy of the Forbidden Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Warriors attack Kenshin to keep him from foiling Raijuta's plans. As Yutarou watches, he plummets into the ocean, and Kenshin must try to save him.
episodes.title: Revival of the Shinko Style / Revival of the Killer Sword – Shinko Style

episodes.synopsis: After surviving a perilous situation, Kenshin confronts Raijuta, who has betrayed him with a murderous plan. Kenshin must act fast to foil it.
episodes.title: Dissolution of a Nightmare / Destruction of a Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: On a train trip, Kenshin gets enmeshed in a caper involving large sums of money, a would-be thief, a band of pirates and a disappearing horse.
episodes.title: Danger on a Runaway Locomotive / Surprise Incident on a Runaway Locomotive

episodes.synopsis: Sanosuke finds a portrait of Captain Sagara and convinces the artist to help him bring down the man who framed the captain many years ago.
episodes.title: Sanosuke's Betrayal / The Fateful Reunion

episodes.synopsis: When Sano sneaks off with Katsu to the Internal Affairs Department, Kenshin intercedes and tries to keep them from becoming a false Imperial Army.
episodes.title: Midnight Battle: Kenshin versus Sanosuke Revisited

episodes.synopsis: Fate brings Kenshin, Yahiko and Sanosuke aboard the same boat cruise that Kaoru is on when pirates attack and poison Kenshin.
episodes.title: The Crimson Pirate / The Red Pirate – Kenshin and Kaoru Separated

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin warns Shuuya, leader of the pirates, of a plot to overthrow her, but she continues to believes in her crew, putting both of them in peril.
episodes.title: Lightning Incarnate / Shura, The Mysterious Female Pirate

episodes.synopsis: Shura learns who gave Iwazo opium and challenges Ginjo, but he fights dirty. Kenshin steps in, but Geki deals a lethal blow to all of Kairyu Island.
episodes.title: Burn, Island of Terror! The Red Pirate: Conclusion

episodes.synopsis: A brief respite for the group is shattered by a ruthless former Shinsengumi captain who reminds Kenshin of the bad times during the Bakumatsu.
episodes.title: Prelude to the Impending Fight: The Shadow of the Wolf Draws Near

episodes.synopsis: Following another assassination attempt on Kenshin, former Shinsengumi captain Saito reappears to finish the job, but Kaoru tries to intervene.
episodes.title: Strongest Opponent From the Past: Merciless Fangs Strike!

episodes.synopsis: On the brink of reverting to his former man-slaying persona, Kenshin is saved by Saito's superior Okubo, who forces Kenshin into a difficult choice.
episodes.title: A Devil of Vengeance: Makoto Shishio's Plot

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin decides to accept Okubo's offer to travel to Kyoto and stop Shishio from gathering an army to overthrow the government.
episodes.title: A Wish Unrequited: Kenshin Departs

episodes.synopsis: Depressed at Kenshin's parting, Kaoru decides to follow him to Kyoto. So does Sanosuke, despite warnings from Saito that he'll be a liability there.
episodes.title: Change Tears to Courage: Kaoru Kamiya's Choice

episodes.synopsis: After defeating four monks loyal to Shishio, the determined Aoshi refuses to join his ranks, intent on proving his superiority against Kenshin.
episodes.title: For the Title of Strongest: Aoshi's New Conflict

episodes.synopsis: When she encounters Kenshin in a forest, a female bandit and former Oniwabanshu named Misao begins pursuing him, hoping he'll lead her to Aoshi.
episodes.title: The Girl Bandit: Misao Makimachi's Hidden Side

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin, Misao and Saito fight some of Shishio's troops and encounter Eiji, who is seeking revenge on Senkaku, the man who killed his brother.
episodes.title: Conquered Village: The Grasp of Shishio's Hands

episodes.synopsis: While Eiji and Misao make their way to Shishio's castle in hopes of fighting Senkaku, Kenshin has already engaged him in combat.
episodes.title: Across the Boundary Between Edo and Meiji: Kenshin and Shishio Face to Face!

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin confronts Shishio, who refuses to fight him in a weakened state and instead bids Sojiro to battle in his place.
episodes.title: Shock! The Reverse-Blade is Broken: Sojiro's Tenken verses Kenshin

episodes.synopsis: Lost in a forest, Sanosuke meets the kindly monk Anji, who feeds the wanderer and instructs him in a powerfully destructive punching technique.
episodes.title: Sanosuke's Secret Training: The Challenge of Anji the Destroyer

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin and Misao arrive in Kyoto to meet Okina of the Oniwabanshu, and to see the son of the sword master who forged Kenshin's reverse blade.
episodes.title: The Creator of the Reverse-Blade Sword: Shakku Arai's Final Swing

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin is forced to make the impossible choice of keeping his vow never to kill again, or saving the life of a kidnapped baby.
episodes.title: A Killer Without Mercy: Fight to the Death Against Cho of Juppongatana

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin finds his former master, who is not willing to take him back as a pupil. Yahiko and Kaoru find Misao, who leads them to Kenshin.
episodes.title: Ultimate Technique of Hiten-Mitsurugi Style: Reunion with a Mentor, Seijuro Hiko

episodes.synopsis: Okina meets with Aoshi and strips him of leadership in the Oniwabanshu, but Aoshi gets an offer to join the Ten Swords and help them destroy Kenshin.
episodes.title: The Formation of an Alliance: The Day When Aoshi Joins with Shishio

episodes.synopsis: While Seijuro recalls their first meeting, Kenshin continues his training under his former master by learning of a final deadly technique.
episodes.title: Between Life and Death: Master the Ultimate Technique!

episodes.synopsis: At the temple of Shishio near Kyoto, the Ten Swords meet to launch a plan that they believe will propel them to victory over Kenshin.
episodes.title: A Decisive Battle Like Violent Waters: The Strongest Troop Juppongatana

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin travels to Osaka with Sanosuke and Saito to find Shishio, who is launching a steel-plated battleship he plans to use in an assault on Tokyo.
episodes.title: As if to Fly: Stop the Launch of the Battleship Purgatory!

episodes.synopsis: Sanosuke uses the attack he learned from Anji to deflect bullets and sinks the battleship, leading Shishio to issue a one-on-one challenge to Kenshin.
episodes.title: Purgatory Bursts into Flames: The Destiny of Makoto Shishio

episodes.synopsis: At a shrine on Mt. Hiei, the trio of Sanosuke, Kenshin and Saito faces the first of the Ten Swords challengers: Sanosuke's mentor Anji.
episodes.title: Crash! The Lethal Punch, Futae no Kiwami: The Fist of Sonosuke Screams!

episodes.synopsis: Sanosuke fights Anji the Destroyer but manages to show him the error of his ways. Kenshin and Saito move on to the next challenger, Usui.
episodes.title: Reborn to Salvation: The Beginning of Anji’s New Life

episodes.synopsis: Saito fights the blind Usui, but realizes his opponent's hatred has made him Shishio's pawn. Wounded, Saito uses a move he had once saved for Kenshin.
episodes.title: The Wolf Destroys the Eye of the Heart: The Fierce Attack of Zero Stance Gatotsu

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin approaches a room and senses the presence of Aoshi, who is determined to defeat Kenshin and prove himself the strongest once and for all.
episodes.title: The Promised Time Has Come: Aoshi and Kenshin Fight Again

episodes.synopsis: In a fierce battle against Aoshi, Kenshin tries to keep his word to Misao that he'll return his opponent to the decent, kind-hearted man he once was.
episodes.title: Wake Up Now! Ignore Your Wounds and Fight to the Finish

episodes.synopsis: Kaoru, Yahiko and Misao nearly lose their lives in a fierce confrontation with three of the Ten Swords members, only to face three more.
episodes.title: To Make a Miracle: The Battle at the Aoiya

episodes.synopsis: Just when Kenshin's forces are on the brink of defeat, Seijuro appears and convinces Fuji to stand down, leaving Kenshin to fight Sojiro and Shishio.
episodes.title: The Giant Versus Superman: Like an Arrow Shot at a Time of Despair

episodes.synopsis: Sojiro and a wounded Kenshin have their second duel, completing the unfinished business from their first round of combat in Shingetsu Village.
episodes.title: Hiten versus Shukuchi

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback, Sojiro is revealed to have been an abused child treated kindly for the first time by Shishio, who gifted to him a valuable sword.
episodes.title: The Tragedy of a Stormy Night

episodes.synopsis: Torn between the dueling philosophies of Shishio's strength and Kenshin's kindness, Sojiro begins to break down during the battle.
episodes.title: A Duel With an Extreme Moment

episodes.synopsis: The final battle of the man-slayers begins at the top of the Inferno Arena, as Shishio promises to defeat Kenshin in only 15 minutes.
episodes.title: Two Men at the End of an Era

episodes.synopsis: Appearing to be almost invincible, Shishio deals a concussion to Kenshin, then takes down both Saito and Sanosuke, with only Aoshi left to oppose him.
episodes.title: The Age Chooses Shishio?

episodes.synopsis: Trying to shake off his injuries, Kenshin rallies and engages Shishio again, but the two opponents appear to remain evenly matched.
episodes.title: Not Out of Luck!

episodes.synopsis: On the brink of defeat, Kenshin snatches victory away from Shishio, who literally goes down in flames while his followers burn down the arena.
episodes.title: The Man Who is Chosen for Victory

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin's friends drag him from the arena, but the injured Saito is left behind. Kenshin, Sanosuke and Aoshi regroup with the surviving allies.
episodes.title: The Juppongatana Who Remain (aka The Choice for Life)

episodes.synopsis: The group boards a train headed for Tokyo, as Megumi explains to Kaoru that Kenshin's injuries should prevent him from engaging in further combat.
episodes.title: Kyoto, the Engraved Memory

episodes.synopsis: When Kenshin goes fishing to put food on the table, he meets an old man at the river who tells him a tragic story that changes how he views love.
episodes.title: The Legend of the Fireflies

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin and Kaoru intervene when bandits assail a foreign prince. When they bring the injured royal to the dojo, they discover he has a doppelgänger.
episodes.title: The Birth of Prince Yahiko

episodes.synopsis: When the key to an important safe is snatched by a runaway dog, Sanosuke brings the disruptive creature to the dojo, while a dangerous gang pursues.
episodes.title: Find the Lost Treasure!

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the Star Festival, a frustrated Kaoru daydreams about Kenshin asking her to marry him. A pensive Kenshin responds by going fishing.
episodes.title: Kaoru, Ecstatic: Kenshin's Proposal?!

episodes.synopsis: Misao reports a murder, where a strange mark is carved into the corpse. Aoshi receives a death threat in a note that bears the same symbol.
episodes.title: The Gleaming Blade of Legends

episodes.synopsis: When Shōgo kills another politician, Kenshin learns he may be outmatched. Okina links the crime to the persecution of Christians in the Edo dynasty.
episodes.title: The Medallion of Destiny

episodes.synopsis: In Shimabara, the group finds an ally in an ambassador Kenshin rescued. As they explore the world of the Christians, Shogo claims miraculous powers.
episodes.title: To the Battlefield of Shimabara

episodes.synopsis: Believing Kenshin to be a demon, the round man ties him to a tree after losing control of the dogs. But Kenshin's battles are far from over.
episodes.title: Shock of the Rai Ryu Sen

episodes.synopsis: Magdalia saves an unconscious Sanosuke from the floor of a cave, then takes him prisoner. Kaioh, Santo and Shougo plot to topple the Meiji government.
episodes.title: Kaiou's Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: Despite his medical training, Shougo cannot seem to cure his dying sister. Magdalia searches for her medallion and finds some shocking information.
episodes.title: The Days of Remorse

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in a cave after a rockslide, Kenshin and his friends struggle to break free. Now aware of Kaiou's plans, Shouzo resorts to desperate measures.
episodes.title: The Sneering Demon

episodes.synopsis: The army prepares to battle Shougo and kill everyone else, unless Kenshin can stop the fight. Sanosuke forges on to bring Magdalia back to Elsten.
episodes.title: Sanosuke's Tears

episodes.synopsis: Misao is captured and brought to the leader of the army. Elsten fails to prevent the attack, leaving Kenshin just one hour to negotiate peace.
episodes.title: The Last Crusade

episodes.synopsis: After Shougo's surrender ends the war, Kenshin and Elsten await news regarding the fate of the believers. Sanosuke gives Kaoru a letter for Shougo.
episodes.title: Bon Voyage

episodes.synopsis: When Kenshin and his crew meet a man claiming to be the legendary slayer, Battousai, they visit his dojo and try to save him from a merciless gang.
episodes.title: Himura Dojo in Shimonoseki?

episodes.synopsis: When Kenshin loses Kaoru's money, the group must work at a restaurant to pay off their bill. An artist seeking inspiration falls in love with Kaoru.
episodes.title: Crush!

episodes.synopsis: When a man is ridiculed for believing that people will visit the moon, Yahiko protects him from attack. Kaoru, meanwhile, takes on a new student.
episodes.title: Kaishu-Katsu and Kenshin

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin stands up to a group of assassins, allowing Daigoro and Itsuko to remain at the dojo; but when Itsuko runs an errand for Kaoru, she is seized.
episodes.title: The Unending Revolution

episodes.synopsis: When he learns of Kaishu's dangerous plan, Kenshin gets everyone at the dojo, including Daigoro, involved in his rendezvous with Itsuko's kidnappers.
episodes.title: Conspiracy of the Beniaoi

episodes.synopsis: After Kenshin steps forward to battle the leader of the Ben Aoi, he must also face Tetsuma in a sword fight, unaware Tetsuma has another weapon.
episodes.title: Kaishu-Katsu's Determination

episodes.synopsis: The group celebrates the return of Yutaro with Professor Hans, unaware that the Black Knights are on their heels, in search of a divine elixir.
episodes.title: Yutaro Returns

episodes.synopsis: The notebook of Professor Hans reveals that the elixir might cure every illness -- and that the Black Knights plan to use it to rule the world.
episodes.title: The Sanada Ninja Squad

episodes.synopsis: In the forest, a hunter points the group toward the divine elixir, but as they follow a path full of obstacles, the Sanada Ninjas lie in wait.
episodes.title: A Straying Journey

episodes.synopsis: As Misanagi and the Black Knights move closer to the divine elixir, Kenshin's group struggles to survive the deadly perils of the abyss.
episodes.title: A Heatwave from Beneath the Earth

episodes.synopsis: When Kenshin and Sanosuke battle the Sanada Ninjas, a new foe uses a weapon that leaves Kenshin vulnerable. The Black Knights zero in on their prize.
episodes.title: Schneider's Bet

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin faces off against Melder in a ferocious battle to claim the elixir, igniting a conflagration that threatens to take everyone down in flames.
episodes.title: The Two Guides

episodes.synopsis: Misao prepares for her return to Kyoto. When the girls go shopping, they encounter a pickpocket and are forced into combat with his gang.
episodes.title: To My Angel Misao

episodes.synopsis: Almost 300 years after the wind and water clans of feng shui surround a shrine, their magic galvanizes to create a series of disasters in Tokyo.
episodes.title: Feng Shui Surprise Attack!

episodes.synopsis: Jinpu educates the group about the two feng shui clans and the tug-of-war between salvation and destruction. The dojo then comes under attack.
episodes.title: The Magic of Feng Shui

episodes.synopsis: When Reisu's attacks leave Kaoru badly wounded, Jinpu leads a dangerous quest for healing waters amid the warring elements of the feng shui clans.
episodes.title: Tokyo Under Martial Law

episodes.synopsis: Kenshin and Jinpu set out for Nikko to find the hidden jade crest, but Reisui aims to beat them to it by trapping them in a feng shui illusion.
episodes.title: The Enemy Awaits in Senjogahara

episodes.synopsis: In Senjogahara, Kenshin, Sanosuke and Jinpu confront the water clan. Jinpu finds that he is no match for Reisui, but finds another way to be a hero.
episodes.title: The Elegy of Wind and Water
